hints.content:
There were $\purpleD{96}$ books at the sale.  Arnold bought $\blueE{32}$ books.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/47047c12cb1c5e4f54550e6497281c3a276b39f3)

$\purpleD{96}-\blueE{32}=\maroonD{64}$

There were $\maroonD{64}$ books left after Arnold bought some.
There are $\goldE{33}$ books left at the garage sale.

question.content:
There were $96$ books for sale at a garage sale.  Arnold bought $32$ books.  Later, Mel bought $31$ books.  

**How many books are left at the garage sale?**  

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] books
